entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Charlevoix

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
